content.detailedDescription: Feel free to give me a call. i have about 2 hours of footage from 2 seperate dates. i haven't seen any footage that is comparable! you will want a copy! please call to discuss!
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: I have (2) videos. both are about an hour each. both have awesome footage of large ufo with other smaller objects as well!

content.detailedDescription: Wow..I wish i would have known about this site over a year ago.I was flying home from california having returned my disabled son home to the bay area and his mother.Return flight flew over ?Albaquercie? new mexico (northwest airlines...Maybe southwest airlines from oakland ca to hobby airport in houston tx). i know this because the pilot announced the altitude and location moments before the sighting.The girls (2) in the seats in front of me were napping having "partied" in california.And the flight was not a full flight.I had tried to sleep....But usually cant sleep well on flights.After the pilot made his announcement , i raised up from a laying position having taken up at least 2 seats....More than likely 3..........And i was now sitting in the window seat and looking out of the window (window faced north). it was very pretty and it was before sunset........As the plane flew.......Minutes passed......When i observed in detail a large silver sphere hovering stationary at about 35 thousand feet approximately. well....Obviously lower because we flew at 35k feet.Id say it was the size of a small office building. maybe a ten story building.....In diameter if one can describe a sphere in that fashion.I witnessed this thru my window and the window in the seat behind me as i instinctively jumped up to follow it in my line of sight.It was not a plane. not a balloon.Not any publically know aircraft. it was very large though. after seeing this....I questioned my sanity for a brief moment. i thought about questioning the pilot upon departing the plane....But i knew better.(there is no way they could have not seen it on a radar......Or thru their main window....It was too large to miss.) knowing the truth will come out eventually.I distinctly observed "panelling" on the surface of the sphere. large panels.....Not like those on a plane, etc.We had to be flying at several hundred miles an hour......But i did see it for enough of a time to discern details.Um...What was it? i have no damn idea.But.....It was not something one sees in a typical lifetime. this i know for sure.Hope it helps and sorry i couldnt spell the name of the city.However, i think you can decipher the name.Thanks for your time.True story.No deception.Not misleading.
content.summary: Silver globe hovering over new mexico observed from flight to texas 35000 ft approx.

content.detailedDescription: My brother called and said he saw a ufo in the direction of knotts berry farm from our house (south-eastish). i got up and walked outside but didn't have to search the sky to find it as it was directly out my back door (east) traveling from south to north. at first it sort of looked like it might have been a plane, but it was lower than a plane, and in a place in the sky where i haven't seen planes before. one large white light seemed to wrap around the object and blink on and off. a small red light blinked at a faster speed than the white light(it looked like a small red light you'd find on a plane). what quickly made me reject the plane idea was the way it switched directions and turned around unlike a plane would. almost as if it switched to reverse. i lost it behind the trees in my backyard. i was on the phone with my brother while observing this and the phone received interference and the call was dropped.
content.summary: Ufo with strange lighting moved in sky unlike plane

content.detailedDescription: I went out in the back yard and looked up (like i always do) and saw a small brownish copper object. i quickly noticed it wasn't moving, it was just sitting in one spot. after about one min. i ran inside the house and grabbed my camera. when i came back outside i began capture it on video. during the time i was grabbing the camera and got back outside there were two and then they just sat there and slowly formed a line and i didn't actually see any movement but they strangely increased in numbers approx. 6. then i ran inside and looked and looked for my binoculars (no luck:( though) and when i returned the clouds were starting to cover them and i never saw them again :(
content.summary: Sort of coffee bean/copper brown collor. just sat in one place and then split  into a formation. about six in a line about 10-20 feet apart. just stayed in one area and then clouds covered them. i have video footage.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on my porch after having a cigarette with my wife when i saw a star going from se to n. it was a reddish color and was at high altitude. it was travelling slower than some of the aircraft in the area and was what made me believe it wasn't an airplane along with the absence of flashing lights. as i watched the object a second one appeared going from ne to se on a different trajectory appearing to be at a lower altitude and travelling faster than the aircraft that was going nw to ne. after a few seconds the second object began to get brighter and i began to think it was a meteorite. it was way brighter than any of the lights on an aircraft. then the light quickly dimmed back to it original intensity. during the time it brightened, i lost track of the first object. i cannot say where it went or anything. the second object continued on course and i lost contact with it after it became obscured by a neighbor's tree.
content.summary: 2 star-like objects over washington, ia

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on my porch after having a cigarette with my wife when i saw a star going from se to n. it was a reddish color and was at high altitude. it was travelling slower than some of the aircraft in the area and was what made me believe it wasn't an airplane along with the absence of flashing lights. as i watched the object a second one appeared going from ne to se on a different trajectory appearing to be at a lower altitude and travelling faster than the aircraft that was going nw to ne. after a few seconds the second object began to get brighter and i began to think it was a meteorite. it was way brighter than any of the lights on an aircraft. then the light quickly dimmed back to it original intensity. during the time it brightened, i lost track of the first object. i cannot say where it went or anything. the second object continued on course and i lost contact with it after it became obscured by a neighbor's tree.
content.summary: 2 star-like objects over washington, ia

content.detailedDescription:
I had hiked up mt. chocorua in the white mountains of new hampshire near the town of albany. the had planned on staying over night at an a.M.C. hut (for hikers) near the summit. after dinner myslf & two other hikers were outside looking at the view of the valley below and the night sky.

suddenly i noticed a very bright disc shape that started to move very quickly from the mountains (or ridge) - moving left to right - from one side of the valley over to the other side over the town. it then stopped and hovered for a moment (as if to say "do you see me?"); and then very fast and sudden like shot off into the sky at about a 45 degree angle.

so it moved in a straight line from right to left, stopped and then suddenly changed angle and seemingly went right into outer space at an incredible rate of speed. this all happened very quickly i think in less than 1/2 a minute total time.

i'd say about 3 -5 miles away and a bit higher in the air than the mountain top but straight out or squarely out in front of us.

i just simply turned to my fellow hikers and said, "hey did you guys see that?!" "yeah" was the answer. and i followed with, "we don't have anything like that - do we?" 

"no, or not that we've ever heard of anyway"
content.summary: Very bright disc about 3-5 miles away flew across valley - stopped a moment in mid-air and then aruptly flew off - very fast - at an angle into the sky & disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Please stick with till the very end.

now, this is the story all about how
my life got flipped-turned upside down
and i'd like to take a minute
just sit right there
i'll tell you how i became the prince of a town called bel air

in west philadelphia born and raised
on the playground was where i spent most of my days
chillin' out maxin' relaxin' all cool
and all shootin some b-ball outside of school
when a couple of guys
who were up to no good
startin making trouble in my neighborhood
i got in one little fight and my mom got scared
she said 'you're movin' with your auntie and uncle in bel air'

i begged and pleaded with her day after day
but she packed my suite case and sent me on my way
she gave me a kiss and then she gave me my ticket.
i put my walkman on and said, 'i might as well kick it'.

first class, yo this is bad
drinking orange juice out of a champagne glass.
is this what the people of bel-air living like?
hmmmmm this might be alright.

but wait, i hear the prissy, booze, whine, all that
is this the type of place that they should send this cool cat?
i don't think so
i'll see when i get there
i hope they're prepared for the prince of bel-air

well uh, the plane landed and when i came out
there was a dude who looked like a cop standing there with my name out
i ain't trying to get arrested yet.
i just got here!
i sprang with the quickness, like lightening disappeared

i whistled for a cab and when it came near
the license plate said fresh and it had dice in the mirror
if anything i can say is that this cab was rare
but i thought 'man forget it' - 'yo home to bel air'

i pulled up to the house about seven or eight
and i yelled to the cabbie 'yo homes smell ya later'
i looked to my kingdom
i was finally there
to sit on my throne as the prince of bel air


no no in all seriousness, here how it really happened...
my friend and i were at my house swimming in my swimming pool, and i was just floating around looking up at the stars when all of the sudden i realized two of the so called "stars" were moving vertically across the sky, at first i thought they were airplanes, but they didn't have airplane lights, then i thought they were shooting stars but the moved slower than shooting stars and faster than airplanes. i was really, like, surprised at what i was seeing so i hollered at my friend and she got excited too. so we followed the "stars" with our eyes until they disappeared behind some pine trees. 

that is all, thank you  for sticking with my story till the end.
content.summary: A light was moving vertically across the sky!

content.detailedDescription:
Although the actual time period is vague, i believe it was about 3p.M.(high sun)in may of 1972. i was stationed at malmstrom afb, montana as an a1c in security police and working as security escort on a targeting mission with 1 lieutenant, 1 captain, 1 tsgt., 1 ssgt., and myself. we had just finished our mission at echo-4 and were heading home and in good spirits as the mission was successful. we were about 18 miles from base and the weather was sunny, with blue skies and clouds all around. everything appeared normal.

all of a sudden, the engine of our truck(an af 6 pack targeting vehicle), began to sputter and then stop in the middle of the highway. the driver, a ssgt in maintenance, tried to restart the engine with no success. the driver then noticed that we had no power; when he turned the key, there was no turning of the engine, no crackle, no whirrring , no clicking. he then tried the vehicle's radio to notify base that we were having problems and to contact vehicle maintenance for help. but the radio was not working, not even squelch...The capt. asked me to use my walkie talkie and contact csc(central security control)which i attempted; but also could not raise anyone. i checked my watch and noticed it was about 3 p.M in the afternoon and the sun was very high in the sky. we all decided to get out of the vehicle and check the engine to see what could be done..

once out of the vehicle i went to the rear to set up a security zone for us.
i tried my radio once again with no success. as i attempted to check the squelch, i happened to look toward the east and tilted my head upward to what appeared to be a very thick white cloud, approx. 100-150 feet above me, that seemed to come out of nowhere. i wouldn't have taken a second look if it wasn't for the very bright silvery craft that came out of the cloud. it made no noise except for a slight humming sound. i stood there staring, and called out to my team to come to me. as they approached me, they saw me staring and looked up and saw what i was seeing. the craft was huge! it was approx. 30 to 40 feet high and was the size of 2-3 football fields! it was triangular and square in shape. bright silver, almost as bright as the sun! we all had to shield our eyes as it hovered and moved slowly toward the north. it moved very slowly(about 1 mph) to come out of the clouds; and when it finally did; it took off toward the northern sky in a flash! as it hovered over us, i had the feeling that it was observing us, and so did the captain. he reminded me to not take any offensive posture with my weapon. i agreed. once the vehicle disappeared, we looked at each other and wondered what we had just seen.

we had all agreed to report this as soon as we got back to base. it was then that i heard my radio squelch and asked the captain if he wanted me to report on the air. he said no, just to make a security check with csc. 
the driver got back into the cab of the truck and turned the key..It immediately started as if nothing had happened. we all got in the vehicle and started for base.

when we arrived on base, the capt. and lt. had to go to their targeting hqtrs in order for them to relinquish their targeting codes. once there, we all started getting out of the truck to got with him to brief on what happened. the capt. told us no. that he and the lt. would do the reporting and if we were needed, he would come and get us. about an hour later, the captain returned and told us the following quote.."if you value your careers, you will not talk about this incident ever again. that is an order"

i have kept my silence for over 38 years. i wish i had more to tell you as i do not remember their names. hopefully. they have spoken and told their stories and we may get to the bottom of this. i see this incident almost every day in my mind's eye and wonder to this day what it was. perhaps someday i will know...

daniel j. harvey
content.summary: Craft appeared from east in clouds, approx. 30 ft. high, length=2-3 football fields, bright silver.

content.detailedDescription: Aug 3rd, 2011 7:50pm. just went outside to smoke cig and saw shiny silver cylinder with no wings glide by below clouds. from nne to ssw. going slower than an airplane would at that altitude and in a steady straight pace with no noise. ran got binoculars and saw black marks from nose to midway, kinda looking like it had 2 levels? by time found camera, it was gone.
content.summary: Shiny silver cylinder, no wings, silent slow cruise by, below clouds

content.detailedDescription: It was during the summer of 1966. a friend of mine and myself decided to go fishing for catfish on wewoka creek, which is about 5 miles n. of holdenville,oklahoma. at around one in the morning we both noticed what appeared to be two bright stars moving strangely in the sky ne of us. we climbed up the creek bank so we could see the lights better. i would guess these light to be about a half mile away at this time, but they were coming our way. the movement of the lights was what had our attention the most. one light would move horizontally and stop then the other one would move near it. they also did this in a vertical manner. the movement was very fast and they did not slow down to stop, they just stopped in the sky. they made absolutely no noise. we were a little shaken by this activity so we got to the vehicle and headed s. towards holdenville. we had gone about a mile and a half when i looked out the rear window and saw one of the lights move, what i would guess to 40 to 50 yards,above us. we stopped the vehicle in the middle of the gravel road and both of us exited the vehicle. the object, bright light, lit up everything around us for about two or three seconds. i remember seeing cattle standing in the pasture and feeling like something had just taken a picture of me with a giant flashbulb. after the bright light went out, the object sped up into the sky, at what appeared to be somewhere around the speed of light, and disappeared into the star lit sky. there was no sound and we never spotted the other bright light again. we reported this to the local police in holdenville and asked them if they had had any other reports. they thought we were either drunk or crazy so we just kept it to ourselves for years. i must admits that i spent several sleepless nights trying to rationize what i had seen. today, i am just thinkful that i was there to have this experience.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: *fishing with friend late at night, spotted two bright star like objects moving oddly in night sky, as objects got nearer we decided to leave, one of the objects hovered over us as we were driving, we exited the vehicle and everything around us lit up

content.detailedDescription:
I am filing this report for the witness, with his permission, after our phone interview. i initially contacted witness after his pictures appeared on the wbng-tv website. l. behr asd/fi

witness was in the parking lot of lourdes hospital on riverside drive in binghamton ny.  he observed object over the hill, across the river in what would be vestal ny.  the object appeared huge at this point, "as large as a football stadium". object was stationary and then shot up and vanished. this upset the witness who called his mother.

he then finished his business at the hostial and was on his way home, approximately 20-30 minutes after the initial sighting.  he was traveling on riverside drive toward his home in johnson city when he observed the object again to his right, this time much higher in the sky. witness pulled onto a side street and took 2 pictures.  he observed the object for approximately 2 mintues before it again shot straight upward and away.

witness stated that there were other people in the hospital parking lot who observed the object but, he did not know who they were.  he also stated that people have posted on the wbng web site that they also saw the object.  i will follow up on this.

l behr
content.summary: Ufo spotted in binghamton

content.detailedDescription: I was watching this for about two hrs in lowell massachusetts on the pawtucket blvd. unfortunatley i only got to record about 10 min of it.  this thing was moving back and fourth made no sound dropped so low was in the tree line.  it also put a light down on the ground atleast 3 times that i seen.  it was like a helicopter spot light but it never moved like a heli.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Was in the air for about two hrs i finally had to go home and get my cam!!!

content.detailedDescription: I've been watching objects like this for around a month now, not every day but 4-5 nights a week they're around. i've made reports previously but have not had a good enough camera to film at night. i borrowed my mother-in-laws canon dc420 and was able to get the footage attached to this report. the camera records directly to a mini dvd. i converted the *vob file to an *.Avi so anyone could view the file, but the original is a little clearer. i have a total of about 40 minutes of footage so far but am only uploading just a few minutes worth due to the size of the file.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo changing colors in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, my name is (name moved fi box) cms 10/10/11 06:34 cst flg. i live in kyle (hays county) right outside of austin. i believe that i witnessed either an astrological event or a ufo on august 2, 2011. the following is what i saw. on august 1, 2011 i decided to stay up past midnight, thus becoming august 2nd. at about 3:45 am i decided to let the dogs out for the night, and usually i enjoy looking up at the night sky and seeing the stars since it's very dark out in the country. well, as i was about to go in i noticed a very brilliant white light. at first, i thought it was just a star, but as i looked closer, this star was very bright. it was so bright it even appeared to have tails coming from it. in all the times i've been outside and looked up at the night sky, i've never seen such a sight. something was strange about this light. it didn't move. it was just stationary. so, i decided to go in and grab my video camera and start recording. unfortunely, what i recorded isn't exactly what i saw with my own eyes. please let me explain what i saw with my own eyes and binoculars. with my eyes, it was this intense bright white light and on the left side of it had a tail or point (like a comet). the tail went went from a soft blue to a white. sometimes it even seemed to have tails on both sides of the object. then after a minute or two, the white light would reduce and change into two separate colors green & red, and then aftera minute the light grew in size back into white. i know what you're probably thinking. airplane. where i live, there are always airplanes flying over. the airplanes always moved across the sky and keep going. i stayed out in the back yard and looked at this object from 3:45 am to 5 am. it never moved. not one bit. also, i looked with my binoclulars, which are a little crappy, but i still used them. with the binoculars this object was definitely changing colors and even changing shapes. i even did my own testing the following night at about 12:30 am to see if i could see it again because at first, i thought it was a comet, but it never moved like a comet. also, i tried to film other stars with the video camera but never showed up on the video. does this mean that it wasn't a star? i honestly don't. i was hoping that you could investigate this. i  just wondering if this was just acommon astrological event, or star that i've never seen, or something else. within this email are some attachment of concept painting i did. i did this in photoshop. the night sky was just a picture reference used to depict the night. i painted in the object i saw. there were about 3 stages it went through, and after the 3rd stage it would revert back to the first. also, here is the youtube link to my video. in advance, i'm sorry about the shakyness of the camera. to get a good shot, i had to hold it over my head which caused my arms to sway a little, and also i kind of run at the mouth about the decription. i just wanted to give as much information as possible, to whoever was watching the video. thank you for your time & attention.

here's the youtube video
(link moved to fi box)  cms 10/10/11 06:35 cst flg
content.summary: Brilliant white light that changed into green & red lights, and also changed shape, along with tails on both sides that resembled a comet.

content.detailedDescription:
This object on the 1st night appeared out of nowhere and thought it was a helicopter at 1st, got binoculars and saw they it was pulsating the blue, green, red, yellow lights, i had a object in the foreground a tower to give it some kind of refrence, i saw it climb turn to the left and move a distance then moved back to the right then again same thing in a matter of 5 mins, over the next hour it climbed and steered to the right, extremely unusal. i am an air force vet and live near lackland and kelly afb, and it was not an aircraft as we know, this thing was a real ufo, unidentifiable.
looking forward to seeing it again tonight, i did take some pictures using a 35mm camera, not sure what they look like yet. i have seen other objects ufo's before nothing like this, colors and seemed to be under intelligent control...Thanks...
v.Turner.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unusal lights, center was white light, red on left side, blue blue/green on right side, have seen it 3 nights in a row, looking for it tonight!

content.detailedDescription: It was during the summer of 1966. a friend of mine and myself decided to go fishing for catfish on wewoka creek, which is about 5 miles n. of holdenville,oklahoma. at around one in the morning we both noticed what appeared to be two bright stars moving strangely in the sky ne of us. we climbed up the creek bank so we could see the lights better. i would guess these light to be about a half mile away at this time, but they were coming our way. the movement of the lights was what had our attention the most. one light would move horizontally and stop then the other one would move near it. they also did this in a vertical manner. the movement was very fast and they did not slow down to stop, they just stopped in the sky. they made absolutely no noise. we were a little shaken by this activity so we got to the vehicle and headed s. towards holdenville. we had gone about a mile and a half when i looked out the rear window and saw one of the lights move, what i would guess to 40 to 50 yards,above us. we stopped the vehicle in the middle of the gravel road and both of us exited the vehicle. the object, bright light, lit up everything around us for about two or three seconds. i remember seeing cattle standing in the pasture and feeling like something had just taken a picture of me with a giant flashbulb. after the bright light went out, the object sped up into the sky, at what appeared to be somewhere around the speed of light, and disappeared into the star lit sky. there was no sound and we never spotted the other bright light again. we reported this to the local police in holdenville and asked them if they had had any other reports. they thought we were either drunk or crazy so we just kept it to ourselves for years. i must admits that i spent several sleepless nights trying to rationize what i had seen. today, i am just thinkful that i was there to have this experience.

content.summary: *fishing with friend late at night, spotted two bright star like objects moving oddly in night sky, as objects got nearer we decided to leave, one of the objects hovered over us as we were driving, we exited the vehicle and everything around us lit up

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my house with a friend were talking when i looked up at the sky and saw a bright red/orange orb, slowly moved across the sky{at very high altitude} zig zagging very fast and erratically at the same time the light was fluctuating between being a pin point dot and sort of fuzzy round the edges. the sky was completly clear and i could see all stars clearly. it hovered for some time {5 mins or so} then it shot over the horison at a great speed and a high altitude, this was also witnessed by my friend who was there also. it was clearly doin over 1000 mph as it disappeared over the horizon.
content.summary: Bright red/orange orb changed intensity over time

content.detailedDescription:
About 9:15pm i went out to my front porch to let my cat out. i have a clear view for about 800 ft out and left to right about 1000 ft.  then trees block any view.  a bright ball of light appeared from my left, travelling left to right.  it was about 500 ft. away and took about 3 or so seconds to travel my field of view.  it was low, about 100 to 150 ft off the ground.  now the intresting part, right behind it, about 200 ft. behind it, was a 2 engined small plane chasing the light. the plane was flying level at the same level as the ball of light.  they both flew out of sight in a few seconds. once they got behind my trees i could no longer track them.  i called to my wife, but it happened all too quickly.
the direction of travel was sw to ne.
content.summary: Ball of light, no sound, bright, moving quickly not big but not tiny

content.detailedDescription: I've always been a skeptic, but this i've never been able to exsplain even to my self? what is it? what hapend? why? it was a clear day not a cloud in the sky not even one!!! then i look up and a cloud like formation just over head, in the center a swiral of lights and colors, this hapened aroung noon time for only a few minuts it seemed? then it was gone and the sun was setting/ who ever reads this if you know of any one that can identify my drawing of what i saw please email me! i didn't know much or any thing about ufos before this event! can some one tell me what it was? i don't tell people about this because its not taken sereusly by any one, so i've keped it quiet to my self for all these years. some one please email me thank you.
content.summary: Over my front yard

content.detailedDescription: Parked beside the 421 bridge at approx 1:00 am 08/03/2011, walked to waters edge to view stars and an object appeared in the northwest, low near the mountain tops and hovered, wobbled and shot in various directions. it was an upright trianular shape and was an orangeish glow with bluish lights hinted at the center, or so it appeared. watched for over an hour and left the site with it still in the sky. appox distance: 2 - 3 miles. no blinking lights. the light would also vary in intensity. we watched until myself and another witness were convinced that it was not an aircraft or man-made object.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched the object appear from nowhere while viewing stars at 421  bridge and for over an hour, the object performed  maneuvers, hovered, changed positions... never saw it leave.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i and freind were surf fishing at topsail island.I had reeled my line in and just happened to look down the beach to the south spotted an orange sphere traveling north in a straight path down the path of the island.My wife turned and saw the object.When the object got directly overhead of us it stopped i had a flash light and blinked it off and on and the object did the same thing.It sat there about thirty seconds got brighter and just blinked out.We were still looking for the object and looked south again there came another orange sphere it slowed down in about the same area and stopped again near where the first one did,i blinked the flashlight again and it blinked also.Started going again toward the north and just blinked out about the same area as first.
content.summary: Watched two orange orbs come down the beach

content.detailedDescription:
March 2009, santa barbara, ca. 
by rustam katranov
content.summary: March 2009, santa barbara, ca.

content.detailedDescription: We observed a bright orange light hovering above either the lake or the shoreline.  the damn is about a mile from where we sat so we estimate the light was half mile away.  we watched for 10 or so minutes and then the light vanished.  about 5 minutes later it reappeared in the same place, it remained for about a minute and then disappeared again.  about a minute later we observed the light rising from the ground or water back to about its original position.  the light seemed to turn or rotate and then shot off into the night sky and quickly vanished from our sight.
content.summary: Ufo sighting near fort peck dam

content.detailedDescription:
****please forward to doug wilson*******i have spoken to him regarding this event. thank you


on july 29, 2011 at approximately 3:00am, i let my dog out. while i was outside i noticed how clear the sky was and how easy it was to see the stars when most of the neighborhood lights were out. i noticed an exceptionally bright star in the east, however, it seemed closer than the other stars. while i wathced it, there seemed to be tentacles coming from the object and it became brighter. i could not believe what i was seeing and while i watched it longer, it began to change shape and color includings grrens, blues and reds. the object also changed from a solid object to a type of mist then back to a solid abject. 
interestingly i did not feel scared or the need to react defensively. i did not think i needed to wake up my family to see the object. i felt the object was interacting with me and our experience was similar to a child playing with a pet. 
this viewing happened four days ago and i am still very tired.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Chevron,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Oval,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: Ft.Collins, co object in sky

content.detailedDescription: A fireball falling through the sky. it was larger than anykind of meteorite and didn't move like one. it eventually went down about a mile up road. five minutes later another one appeared on the same path and went down in the same place. the trail led to an old out of use quarry. upon entering and searching the quarry we found no debris or damage of any kind. however the entire quarry could not be searched as we left before moving into the second fenced off area due to hearing strange sounds and my friend insisting she was being watched.
content.summary: Two fireballs decending to the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
3 of us saw something very odd. lasted about 20 sec.
i first spotted 3 slightly blurred, bluish lights travelling very fast in formation in close above tanglewood during intermission.
i poked two friends standing next to me and said the classic "check that out -- what the hell is it?"
no sound. seemed close enough to make out fast moving blurred objects. enough so they didn't seem to be at high altitude.

then the lights moved in and around in each other. we assumed they were jets. 
my first thought was that they looked like something you'd see blue angels doing in an air show.
then the lights moved at such odd angles to each other in what seemed physically impossible changes and seemed to be gaining speed as they moved away.
within seconds they were out of view beyond the treeline horizon.
content.summary: 3 blurred bluish lights moving in high speed formation, weaving in and around each other
